data.name: Commercial Overdraft
data.description: Protect yourself from overdrawing or having paymets dishonoured. Link your Commercial Access Account to our Commercial Overdraft and enjoy more flexibility

features.additionalInfo: You can self-serve your day-to-day banking needs via Bank Australia's App, Internet Banking or Phone Banking.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applications for loans are subject to the Bank's lending criteria.
Includes Non-trading Companies and/or Family/Unit/Hybrid Trusts

eligibility.additionalValue: Business must be registered in Australia

eligibility.additionalInfo: Available to customers carrying on an enterprise or activities done in the form of a business.

eligibility.additionalValue: Natural Person or In trust for a Natural Person or Non-Individual entity

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The establishment fee is caluclated at 0.5% of the borrowing amount. Other fees may apply.

fees.name: Mortgage Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request Bank Australia to arrange for the registration of discharge or Bank Australia is required to attend settlement. It covers preparation of the discharge of mortgage form. Statutory government registration fees will still apply.  Additional fees may apply and should be paid direct to our agent if settlement is requested in a location other than a Bank Australia office. Additional Solicitor Fee may apply

fees.name: Portability Fee- Existing Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a property securing a loan is replaced with a property that is already registered with a Bank Australia mortgage.

fees.name: Portability Fee- New Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request that a property securing a loan is replaced with a property that is a new security to Bank Australia. Additional Valuation costs may apply.
